author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1528533 from trunk to branch-2.1-beta to fix MAPREDUCE-5530. Fix compat with hadoop-1 in mapred.lib.CombinFileInputFormat by re-introducing isSplittable(FileSystem, Path) api and ensuring semantic compatibility. Contributed by Robert Kanter.

author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1528533 from trunk to branch-2 to fix MAPREDUCE-5530. Fix compat with hadoop-1 in mapred.lib.CombinFileInputFormat by re-introducing isSplittable(FileSystem, Path) api and ensuring semantic compatibility. Contributed by Robert Kanter.
